song.title: Your Shirt
song.verse: This time it doesn’t feel like you want it all + Did I do something wrong to make you go? + Said I would know when it's all good to fall + Now I just need you here to hold me close
Cause I don't want another heart to fill the holes + That you left under my covers for me to grow cold + I don't wanna miss somebody who's not missing me + But the city feels so lonely when you leave
song.chorus: My room, where I want you + Tangled in my sheets + In your shirt that I got you + Half asleep, holding onto me + My bed where you left me + Tangled up, now it's noon + In your shirt that you gave me + Half asleep, wishing I still had you
song.bridge: Half asleep, wishing I still had you
song.verse: This time you said you’re playing games again + What are we becoming of it now? + It's fine, I said, if you're the one in my head + Cause I just don't know how to put you out
Cause I don't want another heart to fill the holes + That you left under my covers for me to grow cold + I don't wanna miss somebody who's not missing me + But the city feels so lonely when you leave
song.chorus: My room, where I want you + Tangled in my sheets + In your shirt that I got you + Half asleep, holding onto me + My bed where you left me + Tangled up, now it's noon + In your shirt that you gave me + Half asleep, wishing I still had you
song.bridge: + Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh + Ooh ooh ooh ooh + Ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh + I'm half asleep, wishing I still had you
